issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
While attempting to close another bug, I navigated to Base UI>Views>Email Dialog and when the page loaded, the photo picker was rendered, but then collapsed and was unusable. THis behavior was not noted on the other iPad running 3.2.2.

Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KS 1.7.0 on an iPad running 4.3
2) Launch KS and navigate to Base UI>Views>Email Dialog

Result:
Picker drawn but then collapses

Expected Result:
Picker functional

Notes:
OCCURS ON: 
iPad 1 (4.3)
iPad 2 (4.3.2)

DOES NOT OCCUR on:
iPad 3.2.2
fields.summary: iOS: KitchenSink:  Base UI>Views>Email Dialog photo picker non functional on iPad with 4.3, ok on 3.2.2
fields.environment: iPad 4.3, Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.0.201105131803, Titanium SDK version: 1.7.X r3982f4e7

comments.body: iOS no longer likes when you specify the entire screen for a popover to point to. We now dummy in data when no popover view is specified to generally point towards the nav bar.
